achievements: Independently conceived the theory of evolution by natural selection.
Co-published a paper with Charles Darwin on the theory of evolution.

occupation: Scottish Knight, Leader of the Wars of Scottish Independence
achievements: Led the Scots to victory against the English at the Battle of Stirling Bridge.
Became a national hero in Scotland.
Author of the bestselling historical novel 'Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ'
Union general during the American Civil War
Served as Governor of the Territory of New Mexico and U.S. Minister to the Ottoman Empire
